analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x295b52907435bfa10e6edaa7d11d976e6e97ca1e.sol#12-13)
LiteCoinW_Plus.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x295b52907435bfa10e6edaa7d11d976e6e97ca1e.sol#38-40)
